name: Moroccan Style Chicken Burger
description: This might be your new favourite burger. The addition of salty olives and sweet apricots gives it a Moroccan-inspired flair. Sandwich between stacked lettuce leaves for a lighter meal. Don’t go another summer without trying this recipe!
preparation: Meanwhile, finely chop apricots and olives.
In large bowl, combine apricots, olives, ground chicken, and seasoning until well blended. Form into four patties.
Grill patties with lid closed until cooked, approximately 5–7 min per side.
Meanwhile, in small bowl, combine mayonnaise, sauce mix, and lemon juice. Set aside.
Place patty on bottom bun; top with lettuce. Add additional toppings, if desired. Spread top bun with sauce, then cover.
tips: While the grill is on, add sliced zucchini, eggplant, or bell peppers to use as burger toppers.
